name: Circles (itch) (PeteMakesThings)
description:
A short game for Trijam 135

Jump from bubble to bubble. Avoid baddies. Reach the end.

Arrows to rotate, up to swim forwards.

Space to boost when not in a bubble. Needs a sec to recharge.

Joypad might work too.

Music generated by http://computoser.com/
